channel.title: Please help! music errors are stopping my compiling
channel.description:
Error below... "Compiling..... client.java:758: error: waveplay has private access in signlink if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) { ^ client.java:758: error: array required, but boolean found if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) { ^ client.java:759: error: method wavereplay in class signlink cannot be applied to given types; return signlink.wavereplay(j); ^ required: no arguments found: int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length client.java:2866: error: waveplay has private access in signlink if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) { ^ client.java:2866: error: array required, but boolean found if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) { ^ client.java:2867: error: method wavesave in class signlink cannot be applied to given types; return signlink.wavesave(abyte0, i, j); ^ required: byte[],int found: byte[],int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length client.java:3527: error: cannot find symbol new Update("http://www.KillerScapepk.com/7955.zip", "7955.zip", signlink.findcachedir(), true, true); ^ symbol: class Update location: class client client.java:12964: error: cannot find symbol if(signlink.music) { ^ symbol: variable music location: class signlink client.java:12965: error: cannot find symbol if(signlink.musicSr != null){ ^ symbol: variable musicSr location: class signlink client.java:12966: error: cannot find symbol signlink.music = false; ^ symbol: variable music location: class signlink client.java:12967: error: cannot find symbol signlink.musicSr.stop(); ^ symbol: variable musicSr location: class signlink client.java:12971: error: cannot find symbol if(signlink.musicSr != null){ ^ symbol: variable musicSr location: class signlink client.java:12972: error: cannot find symbol signlink.music = true; ^ symbol: variable music location: class signlink client.java:12973: error: cannot find symbol signlink.musicSr.start(); ^ symbol: variable musicSr location: class signlink client.java:13002: error: cannot find symbol case 1: id = signlink.music ?0:1; return signlink.findcachedir()+"music"+id+".pn g"; ^ symbol: variable music location: class signlink Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 15 errors Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . ."
please help, just so you know i believe that this is because of a stop in my client.java please please please help, i cant compile the client.java file now =''[

item.title: Please help! music errors are stopping my compiling
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

Error below…
“Compiling…
client.java:758: error: waveplay has private access in signlink
if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) {
^
client.java:758: error: array required, but boolean found
if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) {
^
client.java:759: error: method wavereplay in class signlink cannot be applied to
given types;
return signlink.wavereplay(j);
^
required: no arguments
found: int
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
client.java:2866: error: waveplay has private access in signlink
if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) {
^
client.java:2866: error: array required, but boolean found
if(!signlink.waveplay[j]) {
^
client.java:2867: error: method wavesave in class signlink cannot be applied to
given types;
return signlink.wavesave(abyte0, i, j);
^
required: byte[],int
found: byte[],int,int
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
client.java:3527: error: cannot find symbol
new Update(“http://www.KillerScapepk.com/7955.zip”, “7955.zip”,
signlink.findcachedir(), true, true);
^
symbol: class Update
location: class client
client.java:12964: error: cannot find symbol
if(signlink.music) {
^
symbol: variable music
location: class signlink
client.java:12965: error: cannot find symbol
if(signlink.musicSr != null){

location: class signlink
client.java:12966: error: cannot find symbol

^

^

^

location: class signlink

signlink.music = true;
^
symbol: variable music
location: class signlink
client.java:12973: error: cannot find symbol
signlink.musicSr.start();
^
symbol: variable musicSr
location: class signlink
client.java:13002: error: cannot find symbol
case 1: id = signlink.music ?0:1; return signlink.findcachedir()+“music”+id+”.pn
g";
^
symbol: variable music
location: class signlink
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
15 errors
Compiling Finished.
Press any key to continue . . ."

please help, just so you know i believe that this is because of a stop in my client.java
